bibl.title: Reading the Signs: The Arrangement of the New Posidippus Roll (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309, IV.7 - VI.8).
bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. iv, 7 - vi, 8. - [Introduction.] - Titles and Epigrams. - Reading and the Interpretation of Signs. - The Section Within the Roll. - Conclusion.
LAVIGNE Donald E. and Allen J. ROMANO, Reading the Signs: The Arrangement of the New Posidippus Roll (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309, IV.7 - VI.8).
